\documentclass[11pt,letterpaper]{scrartcl}
\usepackage{graphicx}
\setcounter{secnumdepth}{0}
\title{Journal Entries}
\author{}
\date{}
\begin{document}
\maketitle

\CMD{for entry in journal}
    \section{\VAR{entry['Date'] | format('%A, %b %-d, %Y at %-I:%M %p %Z')}}
    \VAR{entry['Text'] | escape_tex}
    \CMD{if 'Photo' in entry}
        \begin{figure}[h!]
        \centering
        \includegraphics[width=0.5\textwidth]{\VAR{entry['Photo']}}
        \end{figure}
    \CMD{endif}
\CMD{endfor}
\end{document}
